full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS LNGA'I BYABS KHRUS 'BYUNG BA LNGA YI DUG SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I GSUNGS LAS SNYIGS DUS MI RNAMS 'DOD CHAGS ZHE SDANG GTI MUG SER SNA DANG NGA RGYAL LA SOGS RAB CHE 'BAR GYIS STENG 'OG BAR GSUM NAD DON GA-YO DANG, NANG NAS 'BYUNG LNGA 'KHRUGS PA LAS RLUNG MKHRIS BAD KAN 'DUS PA SOGS RGYAS LA SNA TSOGS 'JIGS PA BYUNG BA DANG, MA SHES NAD GYUR DANG, SNYING RLUNG SMYO 'GUL SKYUGS 'KHRU 'GUL 'GAG RMA SNA DANG, PHUNG PO'I SGRIB DANG, 'BYUNG LNGA'I DUG GIS GSAL BA'I MCHOG NI, YE SHES LNGA PA'I 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS 'DI NI THE TSOM MED ZHES 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG DON GRUB BZANG PO'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
